scripts.db:schema: node scripts/mysql-cli.mjs --query "SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY TABLE_NAME"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:test && npm run db:seed && npm run db:tables
scripts.db:reset: node scripts/mysql-cli.mjs --query "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS activity_log, expenses, budgets, subcategories, categories, users" && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:users: node scripts/mysql-cli.mjs --query "SELECT id, username, email, currency, created_at FROM users"
